author: Cory Doctorow
description: Today's links The curious, intertwined history of climate and digital rights activism: It's going much [better|worse] than expected. Hey look at this: Delights to delectate. Object permanence: Bricked EVs; Cross-stitched tracert. Upcoming appearances: Where to find me. Recent appearances: Where I've been. Latest books: You keep readin' em, I'll keep writin' 'em. Upcoming books: Like I said, I'll keep writin' 'em. Colophon: All the rest. The curious, intertwined history of climate and digital rights activism (permalink) I am an environmentalist, but I'm not a climate activist. I used to be – I even used to ring strangers' doorbells on behalf of Greenpeace. But a quarter of a century ago, I fell in with the Electronic Frontier Foundation and became a lifelong digital rights activist, and switched to cheering on environmental activists from the sidelines of their fight: https://eff.org Over the decades, there've been many moments where I've been struck by the parallels between
title: Pluralistic: The curious, intertwined history of climate and digital rights activism (11 Oct 2025)
